mission.name: Daily Minor: Crystal Keeper
mission.description: Use the repair crystal to repair five damaged blue crystal in the crystal caves. Damaged crystals will not glow. |STATE| / 5

mission.name: Daily Minor: Raiders of the lost Spark
mission.description: Kill crystal crushers and use discharger item on the corpse to collect their charges. Gather 7 charges and report back. |STATE| / 7

mission.name: Daily Minor Plus: Exterminators
mission.description: Kill 10 of the wigglers for the gnomes. Then report back to the gnomes. |STATE| / 10

mission.name: Daily Minor Plus: Mushroom Digger
mission.description: Find a truffle sniffing pig and lure it around. Occasionally it will unearth some truffles. Use the baby pig on the truffles to feed it 3 times. Then report back to the gnomes. |STATE| / 3

missionstate.description: You have to enter the crystal caves and find a crystal that is fitting the crystal you got from the gnomes. Use the crystal on one of the bigger red crystal in the caves to bond them.
You have finished this quest for now.

mission.name: Daily Major: The Tinker's Bell
mission.description: Use the harmonic bell on the mad golems in the golem workshop so that they will automatically be teleported to the gnomish workshops. Then report back to the gnomes. |STATE| / 4

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Member
mission.description: You are member of the Paw and Fur hunting elite. You currently have |STATE| Paw & Fur points.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Ranger
mission.description: You are Ranger of the Paw and Fur hunting elite. You currently have |STATE| Paw & Fur points.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Big Game Hunter
mission.description: You are Big Game Hunter in the Paw and Fur hunting elite. You currently have |STATE| Paw & Fur points.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Trophy Hunter
mission.description: You are Trophy Hunter in the Paw and Fur hunting elite. You currently have |STATE| Paw & Fur points. Ask Grizzly Adams for 'special task' he might have something for you.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: Elite Hunter
mission.description: You have obtained the highest possible rank in the Paw and Fur hunting elite, you are Elite Hunter. You currently have |STATE| Paw & Fur points. Ask Grizzly Adams for 'special task' he might have something for you.

missionstate.description: Grizzly Adams told you that there is Tiquandas Revenge hiding somewhere in the jungle of Port Hope. Go find its hideout and kill it.
You have slained the Tiquandas Revenge.
Grizzly Adams wanted you to go look for Demodras' hideout. He also mentioned that it might be somewhere under the Plains of Havoc.
You have slained the Demodras.

mission.name: Paw and Fur: The Snapper
mission.description: Grizzly told you about the Snapper, a crocodile that already killed many citizens of Port Hope. Try find its hideout and kill it.

missionstate.description: Your mission is to investigate the 5 guards in Thais regarding the Heretic behavior. Tim, Kulag, Grof, Miles and Walter are their names. If you do well you see a holy sprite on you.
You investigated 1 of 5 guards in Thais.
You investigated 2 of 5 guards in Thais.
You investigated 3 of 5 guards in Thais.
You investigated 4 of 5 guards in Thais.
You investigated 5 of 5 guards in Thais. Get back to Thais and report your mission to Henricus.
You investigated all guards in Thais.

Henricus tells you to get The Witches' Grimoire, he sends you to Femor Hills where you can fly to the witches' mountain, say Eclipse to Uzon and he will take you there. Use the vial of holy water that he gives you on the big cauldron and open the chest to your left, then bring the witches' grimoire to Henricus.
Find the witches' grimoire and bring it to Henricus.
You already brought the witches' grimoire to Henricus.
Henricus wants you to find the Dwarfish Vampire Hunter, Storkus, located west of the Dwarf Bridge. It's good idea bring your 20 Vampire Dusts with you to save some time.
Go Back to Storkus the Dwarf and ask for Mission.

Now Storkus wants you to kill a vampire lord, The Count in the Green Claw Swamp, The Count is located near to the Blood Herb Quest. To summon The Count, you must use the coffin in the center of the room. Kill it and bring The Ring of the Count to Storkus.
Kill The Count and bring his ring to Storkus the Dwarf and ask for Mission.
Return to Henricus and tell him that you finished your job here.
Get back to Thais and report your mission to Henricus.
Henricus will gave you a Special Flask (vial of holy water). Go to Liberty Bay and use the vial on an old house. Use this vial of holy water on that spot to drive out the evil being.
Kill the Pirate Ghost and get back to Thais and report your mission to Henricus.
You already cleaned the abandoned and haunted house in Liberty, ask Henricus for mission.
Henricus wants 20 Demonic Essences as a proof of your accomplishments.
Now ask Henricus for outfit to get the Demon Hunter Outfit.
You got the Demon Hunter Outfit! Ask Henricus for mission to unlock more addons.
Henricus wants you to kill a demon called Ungreez. Head to Edron Hero Cave and go down a few levels.
You killed Ungreez, report your mission to Henricus.
You got the the first addon of Demon Hunter Outfit! Ask Henricus for mission to unlock more addons.
Your mission is to go to the Demon Forge and slay seven of The Ruthless Seven Minions. The Demon Forge is located in the Edron Hero Cave, through a portal after the Vampire Shield Quest.
You destroyed the shadow nexus! Get back to Thais and report your mission to Henricus.
Now ask to Henricus for a outfit. He will give you the 2nd addon of the Demon Hunter Outfits.
You got the the second addon of Demon Hunter Outfit! Go now to the reward room and choose one wisely!
You have completed The Inquisition Quest! You can now buy the Blessing of the Inquisition!
You have to defeat all enemies in this mode.
You have defeated all enemies in this mode.

You have defeated all enemies in this mode.

You have defeated all enemies in this mode.
